alert.note: Alert for Faribault; Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:27PM CDT until May 19 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FREEBORN AND SOUTHEASTERN FARIBAULT COUNTIES... At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Frost, or 23 miles west of Albert Lea, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wells around 535 PM CDT. Alden around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Freeborn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
